attributes.action: Keep all gyms open in the second lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
We need the gym to stay open, not just for our fitness but for our mental wellbeing. The gym is an escape for some people and their therapy. In the gym we keep socially distanced, and it is a very clean environment.
With the days getting shorter and the weather colder we are no longer able to work out outside anymore and very few people have fitness equipment. 
Please support us and the gyms to stay open to ensure people’s mental health is still strong throughout this difficult time of covid.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
